com.topcoder.commons.utils

类 PropertiesUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.topcoder.commons.utils.PropertiesUtility

  • public class PropertiesUtility
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a utility class that provides static methods for retrieving properties of different types (String, Integer, Long, Double, Date, Class) from Properties instance. This utility throws en exception specified by the caller if required property is missing or cannot be parsed properly. getSubConfiguration() method allows to extract inner configuration from Properties instance (when "childConfigName.childPropertyName" format is used for property keys). Thread Safety: This class is immutable and thread safe when properties parameters passed to it are used by the caller in thread safe manner.

    • 构造器概要

      PropertiesUtility()
      Empty private constructor.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getStringProperty

        public static <T extends java.lang.Throwable> java.lang.String getStringProperty(java.util.Properties properties,
                                                                                 java.lang.String key,
                                                                                 boolean required,
                                                                                 java.lang.Class<T> exceptionClass)
                                                                          throws T extends java.lang.Throwable
        Retrieves the string property from the given Properties instance. Generic Parameters: T - the type of the exception to be thrown if some error occurred Parameters: properties - the properties container key - the key of the property to be retrieved required - true if property is required, false otherwise (if property is required, but missing, an exception is thrown) exceptionClass - the type of the exception to be thrown if some error occurs Returns: the retrieved string property value (null if property is optional and missing) Throws: T if the property is required, but missing Implementation Notes: 1. String value = properties.getProperty(key); 2. If value == null then 2.1. If required then 2.1.1. Throw ExceptionHelper.constructException(exceptionClass, getPropertyTitle(key) + " is required"); 2.2. Return null. 3. Return value.
        参数:
        key - the key of the property to be retrieved
        required - true if property is required, false otherwise (if property is required, but missing, an exception is thrown)
        exceptionClass - the type of the exception to be thrown if some error occurs
        properties - the properties container
        返回:
        the retrieved string property value (null if property is optional and missing)
        抛出:
        T - if the property is required, but missing
        T extends java.lang.Throwable

      • getStringsProperty

        public static <T extends java.lang.Throwable> java.lang.String[] getStringsProperty(java.util.Properties properties,
                                                                                    java.lang.String key,
                                                                                    java.lang.String delimiter,
                                                                                    boolean required,
                                                                                    java.lang.Class<T> exceptionClass)
                                                                             throws T extends java.lang.Throwable
        Retrieves the delimited strings property from the given Properties instance. Generic Parameters: T - the type of the exception to be thrown if some error occurred Parameters: properties - the properties container key - the key of the property to be retrieved delimiter - the delimiter regular expression pattern required - true if property is required, false otherwise (if property is required, but missing, an exception is thrown) exceptionClass - the type of the exception to be thrown if some error occurs Returns: the retrieved strings values (null if property is optional and missing) Throws: T if the property is required, but missing Implementation Notes: 1. String value = properties.getProperty(key); 2. If value == null then 2.1. If required then 2.1.1. Throw ExceptionHelper.constructException(exceptionClass, getPropertyTitle(key) + " is required"); 2.2. Return null. 3. Return value.split(delimiter, -1).
        参数:
        delimiter - the delimiter regular expression pattern
        key - the key of the property to be retrieved
        required - true if property is required, false otherwise (if property is required, but missing, an exception is thrown)
        exceptionClass - the type of the exception to be thrown if some error occurs
        properties - the properties container
        返回:
        the retrieved strings values (null if property is optional and missing)
        抛出:
        T - if the property is required, but missing
        T extends java.lang.Throwable

      • getIntegerProperty

        public static <T extends java.lang.Throwable> java.lang.Integer getIntegerProperty(java.util.Properties properties,
                                                                                   java.lang.String key,
                                                                                   boolean required,
                                                                                   java.lang.Class<T> exceptionClass)
                                                                            throws T extends java.lang.Throwable
        Retrieves the integer property from the given Properties instance. Generic Parameters: T - the type of the exception to be thrown if some error occurred Parameters: properties - the properties container key - the key of the property to be retrieved required - true if property is required, false otherwise (if property is required, but missing, an exception is thrown) exceptionClass - the type of the exception to be thrown if some error occurs Returns: the retrieved integer property value (null if property is optional and missing) Throws: T if the property value has invalid format or is required, but missing Implementation Notes: 1. String value = properties.getProperty(key); 2. If value == null then 2.1. If required then 2.1.1. Throw ExceptionHelper.constructException(exceptionClass, getPropertyTitle(key) + " is required"); 2.2. Return null. 3. Integer result = Integer.valueOf(value); 4. If ex:NumberFormatException is thrown then 4.1. Throw ExceptionHelper.constructException(exceptionClass, getPropertyTitle(key) + " should be a valid integer", ex); 5. Return result.
        参数:
        key - the key of the property to be retrieved
        required - true if property is required, false otherwise (if property is required, but missing, an exception is thrown)
        exceptionClass - the type of the exception to be thrown if some error occurs
        properties - the properties container
        返回:
        the retrieved integer property value (null if property is optional and missing)
        抛出:
        T - if the property value has invalid format or is required, but missing
        T extends java.lang.Throwable

      • getLongProperty

        public static <T extends java.lang.Throwable> java.lang.Long getLongProperty(java.util.Properties properties,
                                                                             java.lang.String key,
                                                                             boolean required,
                                                                             java.lang.Class<T> exceptionClass)
                                                                      throws T extends java.lang.Throwable
        Retrieves the long integer property from the given Properties instance. Generic Parameters: T - the type of the exception to be thrown if some error occurred Parameters: properties - the properties container key - the key of the property to be retrieved required - true if property is required, false otherwise (if property is required, but missing, an exception is thrown) exceptionClass - the type of the exception to be thrown if some error occurs Returns: the retrieved long integer property value (null if property is optional and missing) Throws: T if the property value has invalid format or is required, but missing Implementation Notes: 1. String value = properties.getProperty(key); 2. If value == null then 2.1. If required then 2.1.1. Throw ExceptionHelper.constructException(exceptionClass, getPropertyTitle(key) + " is required"); 2.2. Return null. 3. Long result = Long.valueOf(value); 4. If ex:NumberFormatException is thrown then 4.1. Throw ExceptionHelper.constructException(exceptionClass, getPropertyTitle(key) + " should be a valid long integer", ex); 5. Return result.
        参数:
        key - the key of the property to be retrieved
        required - true if property is required, false otherwise (if property is required, but missing, an exception is thrown)

        返回:
        the retrieved long integer property value (null if property is optional and missing)
        抛出:
        T - if the property value has invalid format or is required, but missing

      • getDoubleProperty

        public static <T extends java.lang.Throwable> java.lang.Double getDoubleProperty(java.util.Properties properties,
                                                                                 java.lang.String key,
                                                                                 boolean required,
                                                                                 java.lang.Class<T> exceptionClass)
                                                                          throws T extends java.lang.Throwable
        Retrieves the double property from the given Properties instance. Generic Parameters: T - the type of the exception to be thrown if some error occurred Parameters: properties - the properties container key - the key of the property to be retrieved required - true if property is required, false otherwise (if property is required, but missing, an exception is thrown) exceptionClass - the type of the exception to be thrown if some error occurs Returns: the retrieved double property value (null if property is optional and missing) Throws: T if the property value has invalid format or is required, but missing Implementation Notes: 1. String value = properties.getProperty(key); 2. If value == null then 2.1. If required then 2.1.1. Throw ExceptionHelper.constructException(exceptionClass, getPropertyTitle(key) + " is required"); 2.2. Return null. 3. parsePosition = new ParsePosition(0); 4. Double result = NumberFormat.getInstance(Locale.US).parse(value, parsePosition); 5. If ex:ParseException is thrown then 5.1. Throw ExceptionHelper.constructException(exceptionClass, getPropertyTitle(key) + " should be a valid double", ex); 6. If parsePosition.getIndex() != value.length() then 6.1. Throw ExceptionHelper.constructException(exceptionClass, getPropertyTitle(key) + " should be a valid double"); 7. Return result.
        参数:
        key - the key of the property to be retrieved
        required - true if property is required, false otherwise (if property is required, but missing, an exception is thrown)
        exceptionClass - the type of the exception to be thrown if some error occurs
        properties - the properties container
        返回:
        the retrieved double property value (null if property is optional and missing)
        抛出:
        T - if the property value has invalid format or is required, but missing
        T extends java.lang.Throwable

      • getDateProperty

        public static <T extends java.lang.Throwable> java.util.Date getDateProperty(java.util.Properties properties,
                                                                             java.lang.String key,
                                                                             java.lang.String format,
                                                                             boolean required,
                                                                             java.lang.Class<T> exceptionClass)
                                                                      throws T extends java.lang.Throwable
        Retrieves the date/time property from the given Properties instance. Generic Parameters: T - the type of the exception to be thrown if some error occurred Parameters: properties - the properties container key - the key of the property to be retrieved format - the expected date/time format string required - true if property is required, false otherwise (if property is required, but missing, an exception is thrown) exceptionClass - the type of the exception to be thrown if some error occurs Returns: the retrieved date/time property value (null if property is optional and missing) Throws: T if the property value has invalid format or is required, but missing Implementation Notes: 1. String value = properties.getProperty(key); 2. If value == null then 2.1. If required then 2.1.1. Throw ExceptionHelper.constructException(exceptionClass, getPropertyTitle(key) + " is required"); 2.2. Return null. 3. parsePosition = new ParsePosition(0); 4. Date result = new SimpleDateFormat(format, Locale.US).parse(value, parsePosition); 5. If result == null or parsePosition.getIndex() != value.length() then 5.1. Throw ExceptionHelper.constructException(exceptionClass, getPropertyTitle(key) + " should be in format [" + format + "]"); 6. Return result.
        参数:
        key - the key of the property to be retrieved
        required - true if property is required, false otherwise (if property is required, but missing, an exception is thrown)
        exceptionClass - the type of the exception to be thrown if some error occurs
        properties - the properties container
        format - the expected date/time format string
        返回:
        the retrieved date/time property value (null if property is optional and missing)
        抛出:
        T - if the property value has invalid format or is required, but missing
        T extends java.lang.Throwable

      • getClassProperty

        public static <T extends java.lang.Throwable> java.lang.Class<?> getClassProperty(java.util.Properties properties,
                                                                                  java.lang.String key,
                                                                                  boolean required,
                                                                                  java.lang.Class<T> exceptionClass)
                                                                           throws T extends java.lang.Throwable
        Retrieves the class property from the given Properties instance. Property value is expected to contain a full class name. Generic Parameters: T - the type of the exception to be thrown if some error occurred Parameters: properties - the properties container key - the key of the property to be retrieved required - true if property is required, false otherwise (if property is required, but missing, an exception is thrown) exceptionClass - the type of the exception to be thrown if some error occurs Returns: the retrieved class property value (null if property is optional and missing) Throws: T if the property value has invalid format or is required, but missing Implementation Notes: 1. String value = properties.getProperty(key); 2. If value == null then 2.1. If required then 2.1.1. Throw ExceptionHelper.constructException(exceptionClass, getPropertyTitle(key) + " is required"); 2.2. Return null. 3. Class result = Class.forName(value); 4. If ex:Exception is thrown then 4.1. Throw ExceptionHelper.constructException(exceptionClass, getPropertyTitle(key) + " contains invalid full class name (" + value + ")", ex); 5. Return result.
        参数:
        key - the key of the property to be retrieved
        required - true if property is required, false otherwise (if property is required, but missing, an exception is thrown)
        exceptionClass - the type of the exception to be thrown if some error occurs
        properties - the properties container
        返回:
        the retrieved class property value (null if property is optional and missing)
        抛出:
        T - if the property value has invalid format or is required, but missing
        T extends java.lang.Throwable

      • getSubConfiguration

        public static java.util.Properties getSubConfiguration(java.util.Properties properties,
                                                       java.lang.String configName)
        Retrieves the inner configuration from the configuration stored in Properties container. Parameters: properties - the properties with the main configuration configName - the name of the inner configuration Returns: the Properties container with the extracted inner configuration (not null) Implementation Notes: 1. String prefix = configName + "."; 2. Create Properties instance for inner configuration: result = new Properties(); 3. For each (String key; String value) from properties do: 3.1. If key.startsWith(prefix) then 3.1.1. Remove the prefix from the key: String newKey = key.substring(prefix.length()); 3.1.2. Put key/value pair to the inner configuration: result.put(newKey, value); 4. Return result.
        参数:
        properties - the properties with the main configuration
        configName - the name of the inner configuration
        返回:
        the Properties container with the extracted inner configuration (not null)
